article.title: Givens Assigned to Air Force Office of Special Investigations

tags.tag: Air Force Office of Special Investigations
Office of the Inspector General-Office of the Secretary of the Air Force

article.text: Col. Keith M. Givens, USAF, has been selected for the grade of brigadier general and assigned as commander, Air Force Office of Special Investigations, Office of the Inspector General, Office of the Secretary of the Air Force, Quantico, Virginia.
